column5: I have fished Ogoki lake twice with the following outfitter in the warm weather months...http://www.ogokilakeoutfitters.com/ The owener John told me he offers ice fishing as well. I am not that die hard for the hard water fishing buy I figured i would share this with anyone who might me interested. I can vouch for his cabin, It is very nice and roomy with a huge wood stove to heat things up. I am sure half the adventure would be getting there on a snow machine.
